meta_title: What Is Lubrication? Definition, Meaning & Industrial Role
meta_description: Lubrication is the control of friction and wear between surfaces. Explore the strategic meaning of industrial lubrication and its impact on asset reliability.
title: What Is Lubrication?

image_prompt: A high-quality, professional close-up of a maintenance technician in modern PPE (high-visibility vest and protective gloves) performing precision lubrication on a large industrial bearing. The setting is a clean, well-lit 2026-era manufacturing facility. The focus is on the interface between the lubrication tool and the machinery, emphasizing precision and technical expertise.
